评论详情: I was looking for a comfy flannel to wear loosely, and this one fits the bill. It’s soft, a little thicker, and provides extra warmth. However, it runs quite large—I ordered a medium but will likely exchange it for a small.
I like the quality and how it fit

I does not have a hood as per one of the images.  Some images had a hood others didn’t.  So I took a risk hoping I’d get the one with the hood.  It just looked oversized and weird.  The material is nice though.
I’m pleased with this shirt. Fairly good quality. I do recommend these. I bought 2.

POSITIVE: Comfy, perfectly oversized, longer back covers bottom— wear buttoned as shirt or layered over a tee.  NEGATIVE: Colors NOT as shown. Waffle fabric is somewhat okay— brighter pink BUT flannel trim is completely different; orangey salmon with yellow and blue?!?
Got for eagles games! Great color, fabric and quality!! Material is fashionable and great value for money.
I love this!  I would size down. I did and it’s perfect. Can be worn as a jacket or top. I love the length!
This jacket is much better quality than I expected. I sized down one size and it fits perfect. I will be ordering more. It looks very classy. Ordered a Large
It’s missing a button on the sleeve. Super cute but looks stupid without it

I love the jacket.Really warm.Looking forward to using in really cold weather

I normally wear a large to an extra large, but this particular coat runs big. The medium fit perfectly with just enough room for me to be able to wear a sweater or a sweatshirt underneath without being too snug. I ordered the red and the stock image is not accurate, but it’s a nice brick raid, not too bright And I like it. I bought this for a $26 or so when it was on sale and it was very worth it. The material is very comfortable and so far it seems to be very well made. I haven’t washed it yet. I would say the fabric quality is very good. And I am overall very pleased with this purchase. I will definitely buy again when it goes on sale.
This waffle knit plaid shirt is great. Love the material and so the fit. I bought it to fit loose.

Oversized, comfy and light weight! I'm 5'3 150 lbs and ordered a medium but since it's oversized I think a small probably would have fit me better as far as the length of sleeves and back of shirt goes. But overall, color is exactly as pictures and material is soft and seems like good quality even after a few washes!
I love the length true to size, I can wear with leggings or jean ver comfortable! The fabric is strong and not too heavy! I recommend this shirt for anyone!
Love the fabric and colors!

You will not get the same color pink and the trim colors are different. I returned it and tried it again and I got the same colors. Satisfied

Omg. Not expecting this to be my new favorite shirt. The material is so much softer than I expected. Fits really well. Hangs below and covers the hiney. I will be purchasing another one. I’m 5’5 145 and ordered a small. Washes really great too.

Love this sweater! It's a little thin, so LAYERS if you're in 50° or less, but I wore it through airports, bars & dinner and it was great. Only reason this doesn't get 5 stars, is tgat the dye they use is so strong that it dyed other items that were in contact wuth it before its first wash. WASH BY ITSELF BEFORE WEARING.

Such great quality waffle knit material that keeps you cozy and warm but it's still breathable. Comfy all day wear.
This is so cute and comfortable. True to size.

Very pretty top. I’m a size Medium (5’3” ~ 145lbs) so I bought M. Unfortunately for me, it fit more like a Large (length and width). I sized down to a Small and it’s perfect now … so I bought the light pink one too lol!

Wanted to like it - the arms are so long and I think because of the way it's hemmed, it doesn't help the shape. It's boxy which is fine but I wouldn't dare wear it buttoned up. Color is mice. Overall it's ok the quality isn't bad at all. I won't wear this out of the house though so only 2 stars

Material is great and the thickness is perfect. Size medium 5’8 and fits like is should.
This flannel is super stylish and warm. I've gotten so many compliments on it every time I wear it and since I got the white style, I just bleach it when it gets dirty.

Bought 2 of these to give as Christmas gifts, a small and a medium, but one came in a nice ziplock bag and it even had new written on it but the other one came in a clear and bag that had been sealed with green Ready to Ship on it which I read meant that was a return?? This one shocked me because it is thick and amazing quality. I can't wait to wear it. Reminds me of the Aerie waffle jackets. I am 5'6" and 265lbs and a 2x fits true to size.  Highly recommend.
Perfect fall shacket! Long enough it covers your bum and also relatively warm! Well made and comfortable! I wear this all the time!
A nice oversized shirt, love the quality and color and style. It’s well made and is pretty thick. Very pretty with a little stretching. It is soft not a stiff shirt
Fits a little big. I’m 5”8 180lbs Ordered a large probably could have ordered a medium. This shirt is great to throw on if there’s a chill in the air. It’s very comfortable. Worth purchasing
Size down!  This top is huge!

评论概述: Color is not accurate, but it is cozy
评论详情: I ordered the "D Blue", which on my screen looks like a grey-ish blue color - fairly dark. Also, the name suggests "dark blue." The color I received is more like a pale sky blue. So, not dark at all, and the wrong hue. I don't think I would wear this out because in this color and with this material it looks like pajamas. That said, it is rather cozy - both the waffle and flannel parts - so will be a nice around-the-house shirt for when my apartment gets randomly too cold (sure to be randomly excessively hot in a an hour or two).

Loads of loose threads, buttons falling off because they weren't sewn on properly (at least 3 in the first day of wearing it), and IRL just looks very little like what you're seeing in the image. I got it as just a thing to put over pajamas so whatever, I'll keep it, but if you expected to wear it out and about, look elsewhere.
Very comfy!

评论概述: That it looked like it's picture.
评论详情: It fit and in and in style. BIrthday gift.

This is a very nice shacket.  It arrived a bit wrinkled but a quick touch up with an iron and the wrinkles disappeared.  It is perfectly oversized.  I ordered my normal size and it was very attractive with a longer hem in the back.  I received several compliments on it when I wore it with black yoga pants.  If you are on the fence about this, go ahead and order it, you will love it and wear it often by itself as a shirt or over a tank or tee as a jacket.

Looks just like in the photos, super comfy and soft and slouchy, medium weight so nice for Fall but not too hot to keep it on when you go inside. I went to throw my hands into the pockets and was horrified to find there are none! I don’t know how I missed that. It’s honestly a crime this thing doesn’t have pockets, I’m really struggling with whether or not to return it, it’s so cute otherwise. But man, that’s a huge bummer, so be aware if you like pockets in your outer layers.
Product isn’t as stylish or cute as picture shows it to be, might be cuter in a different color or smaller size but I didn’t see it worth it to re purchase to find out.
So soft, warm, sizing was perfect really cute
Exactly as pictured! Love the colors in person

I ordered an XL and it fits perfectly.  I’m 5’3 and 180 lbs.  You definitely need to layer up if wearing in cooler weather.  I wore it to a football game that was a breezy 50 degree day, and was quite chilly with just a thin shirt underneath.  Otherwise, it’s very cute and flattering!
I bought the white one. It washes beautifully.  Took it out of the washer and hung it to dry. No wrinkles.  So happy with it I ordered another one

My daughter loves it! It's soft and you can wear it a few different ways. Nice and thick if you want to just wear it by itself. I got her a x-large.....So I had to get me one just like it in a Medium and it fit perfect. I got to wear it today because it finally got Kool enough. YAY!
I ordered it because of the color, Dark Blue. It’s not dark. It’s more like a baby blue. I’m not crazy about it. Otherwise the jacket is good.

Can’t wait for the cooler days brought this shirt/jacket because it can be worn either way. It is a blend of rose and it is great and it looks great. Oversized stretch is good very soft very flattering. The fit is exactly the way I want it to be. I went up one side because I wanted mine to hang below my bottom and also be able to wear leggings with it perfect

I am generally a size medium and this was definitely true to size with a loose fit. I absolutely love it and will be ordering another! I bought the blue and it is exactly as pictured. It is weighty so it will be nice and warm. I just love the fabric!!! A perfect top!!
Love how simple and easy this piece is. I throw it on over my outfits and it looks great. Quality is great too, as well as the sizing. I ordered a L because I like when it covers my butt.

Love this flannel, it's oversized and super cozy

I purchased this to take on a trip to Salem. I wore it for the first time while there, and found it extremely cute and comfortable! I was extremely thrilled with this and the overall quality until I brought it home to wash it for the first time. After taking it out of the washer, I noticed that every single button had fallen off of the jacket. I begin to sit down and start to sell them back on because I really wanted to keep it, but then one of the buttons was also missing in my washer, and I was unable to locate it. I am exchanging it for a new one, hoping that it was just a manufacturer error. I really loved how it felt and how it fit, but it’s a shame that the buttons all fell off after only one wear and one wash.

The shirts are really nice for fall. A medium to heavier weight. Nice flannel. Comfortable. I ordered a small. My bust measurement is 40”. The actual measurement of the small is Bustv45” Length 26” front & 29” back. Lays well and large enough to button.

A perfect jacket for fall layering. Not thin but not super thick. True to size if looking for an oversized look. Side down if you want more fitted.
color was great size was perfect fit but the material was polyestery feeling. did not like & returned
